sentences.en: A beggar for love is pathetic; a burglar for love is loathsome.
sentences.cn: 爱的乞丐是可悲的; 爱的盗窃是可恶的.

sentences.en: And loathsome canker lives in sweetest bud.
sentences.cn: 可恶的毛虫把香的嫩蕊盘据.

sentences.en: He was withered, wrinkled, and loathsome of visage.
sentences.cn: 此人身子枯瘦, 满脸皱纹, 面目可憎.

sentences.en: I should think it an extremely loathsome profession.
sentences.cn: 我看那是个极其讨厌的职业.

sentences.en: Isn't it loathsome! Isn't it petty!
sentences.cn: 这是多么荒谬! 这是多么无聊!

sentences.en: My wounds fester and are loathsome because of my sinful folly.
sentences.cn: 5因我的愚昧,我的伤发臭流脓.

sentences.en: Some people think that snakes are loathsome creatures.
sentences.cn: 有些人觉得蛇是令人憎恶的动物.

sentences.en: The fish began to look loathsome.
sentences.cn: 那鱼开始显得面目可憎.

sentences.en: The men are a loathsome form of life.
sentences.cn: 这些人属于人类生命中令人齿冷的那一类型.

sentences.en: The witch hid her loathsome face with her hands.
sentences.cn: 巫婆用手掩住她那张令人恶心的脸.

sentences.en: There is a loathsome smell of rotting flesh in the room.
sentences.cn: 房间里有一股令人难受的腐肉的臭味.

sentences.en: Unshaven bus drivers poured loathsome, hair - raising curses out at each other.
sentences.cn: 这些胡子拉碴的司机彼此对骂着, 那些话听了叫人毛发倒竖,十分恶心.

sentences.en: What a loathsome creature he is!
sentences.cn: 他是个多么讨厌的家伙!

sentences.en: Why, thou art as foul as the toal, and as loathsome as the adder.
sentences.cn: 看啊, 你跟蟾蜍一样地难看, 跟毒蛇一样地可恶.

words.tran_cn: 令人憎恶的；令人呕吐的

trans.tran_cn: 令人憎恨的，厌恶的，讨厌的，排斥的
